s.text: I actually think he's a smart, ideologically consistent guy who makes his case in a reasonable way.
I actually think he's a smart, ideologically consistent guy who makes his case in a reasonable way.
Besides, the late night at the hotel bar is used to lay the groundwork to get good dish later.
Bauer really has played a big role in helping put the China issue on the table, and he deserves credit for this.
He asked whether Chinese bad behavior would ever deserve sanctions: Would Bush want to punish them if they doubled the number of slave-labor camps?
